description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(992).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,126,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (31 +63*x +31*x^2 -x^3)/(1 -126*x^2 +x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 09 2013a(n) = 126*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 09 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[992], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(31 + 63 x + 31 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 126 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 09 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[31,63,3937,7937]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 126*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 09 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
